name: yoink-design-system-extractor
description: Browser extension for Chrome and Firefox to extract and analyze design system tokens from any website

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run bundle && npm run copy-assets
scripts.build:firefox: npm run compile && npm run bundle && npm run copy-assets-firefox
scripts.bundle: npm run bundle-content && npm run bundle-background && npm run bundle-popup
scripts.copy-assets: npm run copy-html && npm run copy-css && npm run copy-icons && npm run copy-logo && npm run copy-manifest
scripts.copy-assets-firefox: npm run copy-html && npm run copy-css && npm run copy-icons && npm run copy-logo && npm run copy-manifest-firefox
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.dev:firefox: npm run clean && npm run build:firefox && npm run watch
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../yoink-extension.zip .
scripts.package:firefox: npm run clean && npm run build:firefox && cd dist && zip -r ../yoink-firefox.zip .
scripts.check: npm run typecheck && npm run lint

author: Anders
